content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a 13yearlong case the court of first instance issued a final ruling in favor of the plaintiff partially upholding their claim the defendants were ordered to reinstate the plaintiffs legitimate share payment totaling €1000 and €1912612 along with interest and revaluation the case involved a dispute over the deceased mothers property and alleged simulation of property sales the defendants argued that the action was timebarred but the court disagreed the court found evidence of simulation and determined the value of the plaintiffs legitimate share the defendants were ordered to pay the determined amount considering expenses and previously received gifts the court also considered the costs of the proceedings and ruled that the plaintiff should be compensated for their legal expenses the court made a final decision on the claim brought by icmc acl and vcmi partially upholding the applicants request the defendants vcmc were ordered to reinstate a legitimate share payment to ci totaling €1000 and €1912612 adjusted according to istat indexes the court rejected the application for a declaration of simulation the costs of the proceedings will be divided between the parties with the coheirs ic mc and vc responsible for the costs of an experts report this decision was made by the bari court on february 11 2014
